rules.fullName: Sample%3A %28Blueprint POS%29 inform the new request has been created%2E
rules.description: Send the notification and change owner to Queue "AE GNSS" Used for Request Status=New (when Product Family = Blueprint)

rules.fullName: Sample%3A %28Blueprint SHO%29 inform the new request has been created%2E
rules.description: Send the notification and change owner to Queue "AE SHO" Used for Request Status=New (when Product Family = Blueprint)

rules.fullName: Sample%3A %28Blueprint%29 inform the request has been confirmed or partially delivered
rules.description: Send the notification (owner unchanged)

rules.fullName: Sample%3A Confirmation alert for APAC exc%2E JP%2C TW
rules.description: Email alert to SADM EMEA for APAC except JP and TW
rules.formula: AND( RecordTypeId="012D0000000BVpD", Notify_Sales_Admin_Thalwil__c, ISCHANGED(Request_Status__c), ISPICKVAL(Request_Status__c, "Confirmed"), OR( ISPICKVAL(CreatedBy.uB_Office__c,"China"), ISPICKVAL(CreatedBy.uB_Office__c,"Hongkong"), ISPICKVAL(CreatedBy.uB_Office__c,"Korea"), ISPICKVAL(CreatedBy.uB_Office__c,"India"), ISPICKVAL(CreatedBy.uB_Office__c,"Australia"), ISPICKVAL(CreatedBy.uB_Office__c,"Rest of APAC") ) )

rules.fullName: Sample%3A Confirmation alert for JP%2C TW
rules.description: Email alert to SADM EMEA for JP and TW
rules.formula: AND( RecordTypeId="012D0000000BVpD", Notify_Sales_Admin_Thalwil__c, ISCHANGED(Request_Status__c), ISPICKVAL(Request_Status__c, "Confirmed"), OR( ISPICKVAL(CreatedBy.uB_Office__c,"Japan"), ISPICKVAL(CreatedBy.uB_Office__c,"Taiwan") ) )

rules.fullName: Sample%3A Product Owner Email update
rules.description: This field is needed to send the notification to the Product Owner.

rules.fullName: Sample%3A Request Initiator Email update
rules.description: This field is needed to send the notification to the Request Initiator or Record Creator.

rules.fullName: Sample%3A Update Ship To Account and Country
Sample%3A Update uB Support Email
rules.description: Update uB Support Email depending on uB Office

rules.fullName: Sample%3A embargo countries
rules.description: Reminder that the created record is for embargo countries
rules.formula: OR( Account__r.BillingCountry="CU", Account__r.BillingCountry="BY", Account__r.BillingCountry="IR", Account__r.BillingCountry="KP", Account__r.BillingCountry="SD", Account__r.BillingCountry="SY", Account__r.BillingCountry="UA", Account__r.BillingCountry="AM", Account__r.BillingCountry="AZ", Account__r.BillingCountry="CF", Account__r.BillingCountry="CG", Account__r.BillingCountry="CI", Account__r.BillingCountry="ER", Account__r.BillingCountry="GN", Account__r.BillingCountry="IQ", Account__r.BillingCountry="LB", Account__r.BillingCountry="LR", Account__r.BillingCountry="LY", Account__r.BillingCountry="MM", Account__r.BillingCountry="SO", Account__r.BillingCountry="ZW")

rules.fullName: Sample%3A inform the new request has been created%2E %28CEL%29
rules.description: Send the notification and change owner to Queue "PS CEL" Used for Request Status=New (when Product Family <> Blueprint), PM review pending, Product Center = Cellular

rules.fullName: Sample%3A inform the new request has been created%2E %28POS%29
rules.description: Send the notification and change owner to Queue "Product Marketing" Used for Request Status=New (when Product Family <> Blueprint), PM review pending

rules.fullName: Sample%3A inform the new request has been created%2E %28SHO%29
rules.description: Send the notification and change owner to Queue "PS SHO" Used for Request Status=New (when Product Family <> Blueprint), PM review pending, Product Center = Cellular

rules.fullName: Sample%3A inform the request has been confirmed or partially delivered %28APAC%2C EMEA%29
rules.description: Send the notification and change owner to Queue "Sales Admin EMEA"

rules.fullName: Sample%3A inform the request has been confirmed or partially delivered %28Americas%29
rules.description: Send the notification to ladm-team-emea, logistics_us and change owner to Queue "Product Marketing"

rules.fullName: Sample%3A inform the request has been confirmed or partially delivered %28Americas%2C to be handled by Americas%29
rules.description: Send the notification and change owner to Queue "Logistics Admin Americas"

rules.fullName: Sample%3A inform the request needs AE review %28CEL%29
rules.description: Send the notification and change owner to Queue "AE CEL"

rules.fullName: Sample%3A inform the request needs AE review %28GNSS%29
rules.description: Send the notification and change owner to Queue "AE GNSS"

rules.fullName: Sample%3A inform the request needs AE review %28SHO%29
rules.description: Send the notification and change owner to Queue "AE SHO"

rules.fullName: Sample%3A inform the requested sample has been tentatively confirmed%2C delivered or rejected
rules.description: Send the notification (no change of owner) Used for Request Status=Clarification required,Tentatively confirmed,Rejected,Shipped

rules.fullName: Samples%3A New recording %28Americas%29
rules.description: Send notification to ladm-team-americas

rules.fullName: Samples%3A New recording %28Americas%2C record type change%29
rules.description: Send notification to ladm-team-americas when record type changed to Recording

rules.fullName: Samples%3A Sample recordinig %28APAC%29 initial Request Status to Confirmed
rules.description: Set to Confirmed if - The current user is APAC - Country Manager or (Team leader and Quantity <= 10)

rules.fullName: Samples%3A Sample recordinig %28APAC%29 initial Request Status to New
rules.description: Set to New if - The current user is APAC - Not manager team leader or Country Manager - Team leader and Quantity > 10

rules.fullName: Update Sample Record Type - Sample Record
Update Sample Record Type - Sample Request

tasks.description: The created record is for one of the embargo countries. Please check the Export Control Guideline provided by Legal (see https://wiki.u-blox.com/bin/view/Generic/LegalHome ).
tasks.subject: Sample: embargo country
